pullrequest.title: Replacing Image to Show olliding Rays With Dark Blue Color

content.raw:
Thanks for the new screenshot! Looks good to me, I'd just like to point out that it looks like the lighting is different on your scene, so the screenshot will look different from all the others on the [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=guided_i&tut=guided_i1) and that could confuse users who may end up thinking the ground should get darker.

Do you know why your lighting is darker?
content.html:
Thanks for the new screenshot! Looks good to me, I'd just like to point out that it looks like the lighting is different on your scene, so the screenshot will look different from all the others on the tutorial and that could confuse users who may end up thinking the ground should get darker.

Do you know why your lighting is darker?
